name: Apple AirPods Pro
description: The Apple AirPods Pro are a pair of wireless earbuds that are designed for comfort and convenience. They are lightweight in-ear earbuds and contoured for a comfortable fit, and they sit at an angle for easy access to the controls. The AirPods Pro also have a stem that is 33% shorter than the second generation AirPods, which makes them more compact and easier to store. The AirPods Pro also have a force sensor to easily control music and calls, and they have Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking, which provides an immersive, three-dimensional listening experience.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: The Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones feature industry-leading noise cancellation technology that adapts to your environment. They offer multipoint Bluetooth connectivity allowing you to pair with two devices simultaneously. The headphones include touch sensor controls for easy operation of volume, play, pause, and skip functions. With up to 30 hours of battery life and quick charging capability that provides 5 hours of playback from 10 minutes of charging, these headphones are perfect for long listening sessions. The speak-to-chat feature automatically pauses your music when you start speaking, and the wearing detection sensor stops playback when you remove the headphones.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 5
description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 5 is a premium smartwatch with advanced health monitoring features. It includes a bioelectrical impedance sensor for body composition analysis and continuous heart rate monitoring for fitness tracking. The watch features a durable sapphire crystal display that's scratch-resistant and water-resistant up to 50 meters. With built-in GPS and route tracking, it's perfect for outdoor activities. The watch offers sleep tracking with detailed sleep stages analysis and provides a sleep coaching program. It includes contactless payment support through Samsung Pay and has a battery life of up to 40 hours with typical usage.
features: sleep tracking with sleep stages analysis
